prompt_template:
Describe this image in detail, including:
- Main subjects/objects
- Setting/environment
- Key colors and lighting
- Notable activities or composition
Keep it comprehensive and informative for metadata.

prompt_variations.detailed:
Describe this image in detail, including:
- Main subjects/objects
- Setting/environment
- Key colors and lighting
- Notable activities or composition
Keep it comprehensive and informative for metadata.
prompt_variations.concise:
Describe this image concisely, including:
- Main subjects/objects
- Setting/environment
- Key colors and lighting
- Notable activities or composition.
prompt_variations.Narrative: Provide a narrative description including objects, colors and detail. Avoid interpretation, just describe.
prompt_variations.artistic:
Analyze this image from an artistic perspective, describing:
- Visual composition and framing
- Color palette and lighting mood
- Artistic style or technique
- Emotional tone or atmosphere
- Subject matter and symbolism
prompt_variations.technical:
Provide a technical analysis of this image:
- Camera settings and photographic technique
- Lighting conditions and quality
- Composition and framing
- Image quality and clarity
- Technical strengths or weaknesses
prompt_variations.colorful: Give me a rich, vivid description emphasizing colors, lighting, and visual atmosphere. Focus on the palette, color relationships, and how colors contribute to the mood and composition.
prompt_variations.Social:
Provide a short description of this picture. Now evaluate suitability for social miedia:
technical quality, unique, interesting elements.

documentation.overview: This configuration file controls all aspects of the image description process.

model_settings.model: The Ollama model to use for image analysis. Must be installed with 'ollama pull MODEL_NAME'
model_settings.temperature: Controls randomness in responses (0.0-1.0). Lower values = more consistent, higher = more creative. Recommended: 0.1-0.3 for consistent descriptions.
model_settings.num_predict: Maximum number of tokens to generate. Higher values = longer descriptions. Recommended: 200-400 for balanced length.
model_settings.top_k: Number of top tokens to consider. Lower values = more focused responses. Recommended: 40.
model_settings.top_p: Cumulative probability cutoff. Lower values = more focused responses. Recommended: 0.9.
model_settings.repeat_penalty: Penalty for repeating tokens. Higher values = less repetition. Recommended: 1.1.

documentation.prompt_template: The main prompt used to generate descriptions. You can customize this to change the style and focus of descriptions.
documentation.default_prompt_style: Which prompt style to use by default when no --prompt-style is specified. Must match a key in prompt_variations.

prompt_variations.description: Pre-defined prompt variations for different use cases. Select one by using --prompt-style argument.
prompt_variations.usage: Use --prompt-style STYLE_NAME to select a specific style
prompt_variations.custom_styles: Add custom styles by editing this file or using config_helper.py modify
prompt_variations.available_styles: Run 'python config_helper.py styles' to see all available styles

available_models.description: List of supported Ollama vision models with their specifications and requirements.
available_models.usage: Use --model MODEL_NAME to override the default model

processing_options.default_max_image_size: Maximum image dimension (width or height) in pixels. Larger images use more memory.
processing_options.default_batch_delay: Delay in seconds between processing images. Helps prevent memory buildup.
processing_options.default_compression: Whether to compress images before processing. Reduces memory usage.
processing_options.extract_metadata: Whether to extract EXIF metadata from images. Adds technical info to descriptions.
processing_options.supported_formats: List of image file extensions that the tool can process.

output_format.include_timestamp: Whether to include processing timestamp for each image
output_format.include_model_info: Whether to include model name and prompt style in output
output_format.include_file_path: Whether to include full file path in descriptions
output_format.include_metadata: Whether to include extracted EXIF metadata in descriptions
output_format.separator: Character used to separate entries in the output file
